title.rendered: Festival Ceremonia surprises with its NFTs

content.rendered:
After two long years without being able to enjoy one of the most fun music and art festivals, finally, The Ceremony Festival is almost here! This festival has become one of our favorite shows for its inclusive vision and for always bringing incredible surprises. This year was not the exeption! and by 2022, Festival Ceremonia launches its first collection of NFTs And, we must tell you, they are amazing!

But what is an NFT?

Its acronym corresponds to Non Fungible Token, and it is a unique asset that cannot be modified or exchanged for another that has the same value.since no two NFTs are equivalent. They work through blockchain technology by which they are assigned a certificate of authenticity. Yes! It is basically a virtual work of art.

The collection is called “Ceremonios” and is based on the main cards that appear in the video poster of Ceremonia 2022. In addition, if you purchase it, you will be able to enjoy different benefits and new experiences not only at this year’s festival, but also in future editions!

But that is not all! Though the collection includes 2,022 unique and irreplaceable pieceswhich can be acquired by all attendees, 400 NFTs will be awarded to all those who saved their ticket for the Ceremony 2020 as a reward to his community of fans for the expected time.
